TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Grid extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class Grid Inherits Panel Implements IAddChild
public ref class Grid : System::Windows::Controls::Panel, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type Grid = class inherit Panel interface IAddChild

summary.span: Defines a flexible grid area that consists of columns and rows.

span.span: Defines a flexible grid area that consists of columns and rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含的集合中的物件屬性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 資料行和資料列內所定義可以充分利用縮放比例散佈剩餘的空間。Columns and rows that are defined within a can take advantage of sizing to distribute remaining space proportionally. 當當做的高度或寬度的資料列或資料行，資料行或資料列收到剩餘的可用空間的加權的比例。When is selected as the height or width of a row or column, that column or row receives a weighted proportion of the remaining available space. 這是相對於，這會發佈平均為基礎的資料行或資料列內的內容大小的空間。This is in contrast to , which distributes space evenly based on the size of the content that is within a column or row. 這個值會表示為`*`或`2*`當您使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This value is expressed as `*` or `2*` when you use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 在第一個案例中，資料列或資料行，則會收到一倍的可用空間，而是在第二個案例中，資料列或資料行接收兩倍的可用空間，依此類推。In the first case, the row or column would receive one times the available space, while in the second case, the row or column would receive two times the available space, and so on. 藉由結合這項技術來按比例分配空間和值`Stretch`，可使用分割區配置空間的螢幕空間的百分比。By combining this technique to proportionally distribute space with a and value of `Stretch`, it is possible to partition layout space by percentage of screen space. 是唯一的版面配置面板可以發佈以這種方式的空間。 is the only layout panel that can distribute space in this manner. 根據預設，資料列和資料行最多需要最少的空間以容納包含在給定資料列或資料行的任何資料格內的最大內容所需。By default, rows and columns take up the least amount of space necessary to accommodate the largest content within any cell contained in a given row or column. 例如，如果資料行有一個資料格與長文字像 「 河馬 」 包含在它，但所有其他資料格的資料行中具有"dog"四較小的文字，資料行的寬度會 （河馬） 的最大文字的寬度。For example, if a column has one cell with a long word like "hippopotamus" contained within it but all the other cells in the column have smaller words like "dog", the width of the column will be the width of the largest word (hippopotamus). 您可以精確地放置子項目的所使用的組合屬性和對齊屬性。You can precisely position child elements of a by using a combination of the property and alignment properties. 子項目的繪製標記或程式碼中出現的順序。Child elements of a are drawn in the order in which they appear in markup or code. 因此，當項目共用相同的座標，可以達成分層的順序 （也稱為疊置順序）。As a consequence, layered order (also known as z-order) can be achieved when elements share the same coordinates. 和共用某些常見的功能，但每個可以套用在適當的情況下，更有效地使用內建的功能。 and share some common functionality, but each can be applied in appropriate scenarios to better use its built-in features. 新增項目，根據資料列和資料行的索引;則否。 adds elements based on a row and column index; does not. 項目可以讓圖層的內容，可以在單一資料格內存在於一個以上的項目。The element allows layering of content, where more than one element can exist within a single cell. 不支援的圖層。 does not support layering. 子項目的可以相對於其 「 資料格 」 界限左上角絕對定位。Child elements of a can be absolutely positioned relative to the upper-left corner of their "cell" boundaries. 不支援這項功能。 does not support this feature. 也提供更有彈性調整大小行為與。 also offers more flexible resizing behavior than . 使用物件定義的縮放特性或。 uses the object to define the sizing characteristics of a or . 如需每個單位類型的定義，請參閱。For a definition of each unit type, see . 子項目，如果加入的資料行內，資料行的其屬性設定為`Auto`，而且沒有任何限制來測量子系。If a child element is added to a column within a , and the column has its property set to `Auto`, the child will be measured without restrictions. 此行為可避免水平捲軸顯示如果正在使用中，測量子項目會為未繫結。This behavior can prevent horizontal scroll bars from displaying if a is being used, as the child element is measured as unbounded. 顯示的目的，如子裁剪而捲動。For purposes of display, the child is clipped rather than scrolled. 面板項目不會接收焦點的預設值。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要強迫要接收焦點的控制台項目，設定屬性`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立方格。The following example demonstrates how to create a grid. 在此情況下，方格便會定義三個元素與第四個裝載子內容的項目。In this case, the grid defines three elements and four elements that host child content. [!code-csharp[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/CSharp/Grid_Code.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/VisualBasic/grid_vb.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/XAML/default.xaml#3)]

member this.ShowGridLines : bool with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether grid lines are visible within this .

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether grid lines are visible within this .
if grid lines are visible; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用格線建立內的所有項目周圍的虛線。Enabling grid lines creates dotted lines around all the elements within a . 只有虛線可用，因為此屬性僅做為設計工具來偵錯配置問題，並不適用於實際執行品質的程式碼中使用。Only dotted lines are available because this property is intended as a design tool to debug layout problems and is not intended for use in production quality code. 如果您想在行，樣式中的項目框線。If you want lines inside a , style the elements within the to have borders. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法呼叫期間不得修改的視覺化樹狀結構。The visual tree must not be modified during a call to this method.
